title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Frank Clark trade reaction; NFL Draft Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Frank Clark trade reaction; NFL Draft Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 

In this episode, Middlekauff reacts to the Chiefs trading  answers listener NFL Draft questions in The Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
